name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Intermediate Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Ruby on Rails**, **PostgreSQL**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**. Proficient in **CI/CD** methodologies, leveraging tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** to automate deployment processes effectively. Skilled in modern development languages, including **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, with a strong focus on building cloud-native applications on **GCP** and **Azure**. Adept at implementing robust monitoring and error tracking solutions using **Datadog**, **Sentry**, and **Elasticsearch** for enhanced application performance. Proven ability to collaborate across teams, facilitating seamless communication and project execution.

Brings hands-on experience in MLOps, including the development of ML pipelines and model deployment using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about creating secure and scalable software solutions that adhere to compliance standards while delivering real-world impact.
